EmailTemplate.name: TSE-2017-10-18-Los Angeles Community Appreciation Event.ES-2017-10-18-Reminder.E
EmailTemplate.subject: See You Tonight! Kings vs Canadiens with Turbonomic
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Good morning,
I'm looking forward to tonight's Los Angeles Community Appreciation Event, hosted by Turbonomic, at Staples Center and I hope you are too. To pick up your ticket please find one of our employees in a Turbonomic Polo outside the Figueroa Entrance to the Staples Center between 6:30 and 7:00pm.
General game details are below: <[[https://turbonomic.com/san-francisco-community-appreciation-giants-vs-rockies/]]> Wednesday,Â October 18th 7:00pm Where: Staples Center <[[https://www.staplescenter.com/]]> 1111 S. Figueroa Street, Los Angeles, CA 90015 Dress Code: Business Attire
If you cannot attend tonight's event, please let me know.
I look forward to meeting you,
Murphy Vandervelde
Murphy Vandervelde Sr. Marketing Program Manager - West Turbonomic, Inc.
